channel.title: Brendan Mahan on Lisa's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Brendan Mahan on Lisa's Notebook

item.title: ‘Urgh’ Fields and ‘Argh’ Fields
item.description: My online course ‘How Not To Think Like Sherlock Holmes’ has finally started. This is based on an idea that I had years ago, that I’ve invested quite a lot in, in bits and pieces over time, and the fact that it’s finally underway feels like kind of a big deal. The strange thing is that it shouldn’t be a big deal. Teaching an online class of this kind is well within my abilities.
